description: A free family day out for the littleuns, bigguns and middleuns! Come see our unique, purpose built live arts venue, and enjoy some of the free family activities on offer. Streatham Space Project is neighbourhood arts venue and charity.

factsheet.heading: SSP Family Day
paragraphs: Join us for Neighbourhood Day at your local arts centre! Enjoy a day out with free food, creative activities, and the chance to get to know your neighbours a bit better (that includes us!) Families and buggies are welcome.

images.title: Young people and their adults enjoying the Space on Neighbourhood Day!

travel_info: Train: Balham, Brixton, Streatham, Streatham Common, Streatham Hill, West Norwood
Additional travel info: 30 seconds from Streatham Hill Station - main entrance situated on Sternhold Ave, opposite Proky's Wine Bar

name: SSP Neighbourhood Day
